definitions.definition: One of the tiny dots that make up the representation of an image in a computer 's memory .
One of the squares that make up a work of pixel art or a zoomed-in image in a computer.
A unit of measure used in screen displays, resolutions, and similar visual media that represents either linear measure or area.

main_definition: One of the tiny dots that make up the representation of an image in a computer 's memory .
secondary_definitions: One of the squares that make up a work of pixel art or a zoomed-in image in a computer.
A unit of measure used in screen displays, resolutions, and similar visual media that represents either linear measure or area.
